transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? ha bhai
Executive: Sir good morning sir ek bar bata sakte hai kya baat hui hai aapke liye to main ek bar dekh leta hu usko
Customer: nahi ho pa raha
Executive: nahi ho pa raha kya bol rahe
Customer: nahi ho pa raha pending nahi ho pa raha pending hai
Executive: acha pending hai
Executive: chalo fir aaj sham ko main solution nikalta hu sir wo jo dusra wala ne bataya tha aapko
Customer: hmm
Executive: main aapko call karta hu theek hai
Customer: hmm
Executive: theek hai theek hai main karta hu
summary:

- Pending work not being completed.
